name: Three Body Problem #013 - lucky number thirteen
description: Disclaimer: consumption of alcohol may or may not have played a role in the creation of this piece. Pico-8 simulation of the three body problem. I am trying to find interesting patterns among the chaos. The initial conditions are randomized and not stored, so each OBJKT represents a unique instance of the simulation, now gone forever. Find the source code here https://github.com/atomoton/threebodyproblem/blob/master/WIP/chaos_theory.p8 to see any changes to the simulation or visualization code.
